text: is a Japanese professional footballer who plays as a defender for Hannover 96 in the 2. Bundesliga. == Club career == ===FC Tokyo=== Muroya was born in Osaka. He joined FC Tokyo in 2016 and made his league debut against Ventforet Kofu on 9 July 2016. ===Hannover 96=== In August 2020, Muroya joined German club Hannover 96. == International career == In June 2011, Muroya was elected Japan U-17 national team for 2011 U-17 World Cup and he played 4 matches. He has been a member of the Japan national U-23 team since 2015. Muroya was member of Japan U23 team for 2016 AFC U-23 Championship in Qatar and he won the championship.
